text: No Mercy (1999) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by the World Wrestling Federation (WWF). It took place on October 17, 1999 at the Gund Arena in Cleveland, Ohio. It was the second No Mercy event held by the WWF. ==Matches== No. Results Stipulations Times 1 The Godfather defeated Mideon (with Viscera) Singles match 7:30 2 The Fabulous Moolah (with Mae Young) defeated Ivory (c) Singles match for the WWF Women's Championship 2:50 3 The Hollys (Hardcore and Crash Holly) defeated The New Age Outlaws (Billy Gunn and Road Dogg) by disqualification Tag team match 10:32 4 Chyna defeated Jeff Jarrett (c) (with Miss Kitty) Good Housekeeping match for the WWF Intercontinental Championship 8:25 5 The Rock defeated The British Bulldog Singles match 7:21 6 The New Brood (Matt and Jeff Hardy) (with Gangrel) defeated Edge and Christian Ladder match for $100,000 & the managerial services of Terri Runnels 16:40 7 Val Venis defeated Mankind Singles match 9:18 8 X-Pac defeated Bradshaw, Kane, and Faarooq Four Corners Survivor Series Elimination match 10:15 9 Triple H (c) defeated Stone Cold Steve Austin Anything Goes match for the WWF Championship 21:55 (c) â€“is the champion(s) going into the match ==References== ==Other websites== *Official No Mercy 1999 website Category:1999 in professional wrestling Category:Sports in Cleveland Category:WWE No Mercy Category:1999 in American television Category:20th century in Cleveland
title: No Mercy (1999)
